Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ InfraredState

enum InfraredState
Enumerator
InfraredStateIdle 
InfraredStateAsyncRx 

Furi Hal Infrared is ready to start RX or TX

InfraredStateAsyncTx 

Async RX started

InfraredStateAsyncTxStopReq 

Async TX started, DMA and timer is on

InfraredStateAsyncTxStopInProgress 

Async TX started, async stop request received

InfraredStateAsyncTxStopped 

Async TX started, stop request is processed and we wait for last data to be sent

InfraredStateMAX 

Async TX complete, cleanup needed

Definition at line 68 of file furi_hal_infrared.c.
